CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 7 shows the current - voltage ( J-V ) characteristics of the ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al devices.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. ITO (Indium Tin Oxide)
2. PEDOT (Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene))
3. PSS (Poly(styrene-co-vinyl alcohol))
4. polymer (a general term, likely referring to a specific polymer material)
5. PC71BM (a specific polymer material)
6. LiF (Lithium Fluoride)
7. Al (Aluminum)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the Material Name entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant entities:

1. ITO
2. PEDOT
3. PC71BM

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid Material Name entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
